    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdownDevice

        public void shutdownDevice(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        shut down the device by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • rebootDevice

        public void rebootDevice(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        reboot the device by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isRooted

        public boolean isRooted(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device is rooted.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        true if the device has been rooted, otherwise false.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

                               java.lang.String packageName,
                               java.lang.String className)
        Set the launcher
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        packageName - The package name of the launcher to be set.
        className - The class name of the launcher to be set.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.SDK_LAUNCHER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • captureScreen

        public android.graphics.Bitmap captureScreen(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Capture the screen.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        Bitmap if capture the screen successfully, return null if failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_CAPTURE_SCREEN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • formatSDCard

        public boolean formatSDCard(android.content.ComponentName who,
                            java.lang.String diskId)
        format the sd card.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component to format SD card
        diskId - The Id of sd card to format, if who equals null will throws IllegalArgumentException.
        返回:
        false if format failed, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_SDCARD} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • installCertificateWithType

        public boolean installCertificateWithType(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                          int type,
                                          byte[] certBuffer,
                                          java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String password,
                                          int flag,
                                          boolean requestAccess)
        Installs the given certificate as a user cert.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component to insatll cert
        type - Certificate Type, PKCS12 { #CERTIFICATE_PKCS12} PEM_BASE64 { #CERTIFICATE_PEM_BASE64}
        certBuffer - encoded form of the certificate to install.
        name - Set the name of the certificate will be installed
        password - The password of the certificate, if does not exit will be null
        type - falg for certificate installation. Possible values are KEYSTORE_DEFAULT,KEYSTORE_FOR_WIFI
        requestAccess - true to request that the calling app be granted access to the credentials immediately. Otherwise, access to the credentials will be gated by user approval.
        返回:
        false if the certBuffer cannot be parsed or installation is interrupted, true otherwise.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setSystemLanguage

        public boolean setSystemLanguage(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                 java.util.Locale locale)
        set system language by the current admin.
        参数:
        locale - The language of the application expected
        返回:
        false if set failed, otherwise true
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setCarrierLockScreenPassword

        public boolean setCarrierLockScreenPassword(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                            java.lang.String password,
                                            java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        set extended lockscreen password.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component to set extended lockscreen password if who equals null will throws IllegalArgumentException
        password - the password
        phoneNumber - the phonenum to be display on extend lockscreen
        返回:
        false if set password failed, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_KEYGUARD} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • clearCarrierLockScreenPassword

        public boolean clearCarrierLockScreenPassword(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                              java.lang.String password)
        clear extended lockscreen password.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component to set extended lockscreen password
        password - The password, if who equals null will throws IllegalArgumentException.
        返回:
        false if set password failed, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_KEYGUARD} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
